overview: Come inside the warm and cozy Lake Tahoe cabin with 10 men from the 4-H club of hunky, hot, hung, handsome young men. Hand-picked by director and porn star Brant Corrigan, the ground activities will turn your head, warm your heart, get your hands moving and improve your health with the exercise youll get from whacking your meat to eight scenes. Solos, duos, 4-ways and a full group sexfest will get you to the summit!
title: Brent Corrigan's Summit
